title: Syncing Profile/Deleting previous connection
content:
I tried using Firefox on a new device, I wanted to sync with my previous settings to just restore them, I was unable to remember the password at that time so I reset it, after resetting it it still didn't work and different problems came up so I tried fixing it in a different way. Long story short im unable to connect my current profile (which I used previously with that email) with that account, so im also unable to start any ways of syncing as only this message appears

"This profile was previously synced to a different account

To keep your data organized and secure, each Firefox profile can only be synced to one account. To sign in using email, create a new profile."

Right now im just using a backup which basically restores the profile, but if im doing something on one device it shouldnt sync to the other one, whats the best way of fixing it, is there a way of desyncing the profile with the mozilla account or start a fresh profile but slightly alter some values so I can use this one?

Kind Regards
creator: Jeiblowy

title: Firefox clearing out recently closed windows in favor of session restore
content: In the past, I've always relied on the 'Recently closed windows' option to retrieve my session when Firefox closes unexpectedly. However, lately, seemingly every time Firefox is closed out and then opened up again, 'Recently closed windows' is blanked out and the only option available is 'Restore previous session'--which, almost invariably, does not work and instead simply opens up a new instance of the homepage in a new window. Is there some way to disable the session restore functionality? Or to get 'Recently closed windows' to actually store my recently closed windows?
creator: baylorteague

title: Why does Mozilla Firefox block as unsigned a UK language pack for Mozilla Betterbird offered on the Mozilla update site for Mozilla Betterbird? UK English is my native language, so it matters to me to be able to use it.
content: Mozilla Firefox is blocking the UK English language pack for Mozilla Betterbird that Mozilla lists and offers for download on the Mozilla Betterbird update website. For a native English speaker and student of the language, brought up in the UK, having an app confined to US English is troublesome and unacceptable; so please, Mozilla, sign your own language pack for your own email client app so that your own browser no longer blocks it for users of your own update site. The present situation doesn't do a lot for users' confidence in your products, as it looks as though you don't have confidence in your own products.
creator: guy_james

title: Firefox uses much more memory than Chrome
content:
When I brought Firefox up about a week ago, it presented me with a survey, results of which were sent to Firefox developers. They asked several multiple choice questions about features, but they didn't ask a very important question: Would you use Firefox more if it used less system memory? I currently use Google Chrome for about 2/3 of my web browsing because Firefox uses up too much system memory. I would prefer to use Firefox most of the time, but can't, since it bogs down when memory usage gets too high.

The survey should have included a text input box so users could enter any comments for the developers, and the survey did NOT do that.

So, after completing the survey, I was disappointed that I couldn't comment on the most important issue I have with Firefox. I would like the Firefox dev team to try get Firefox's use of system memory down. A short while ago, I opened 4 websites in Google Chrome, then opened the exact same 4 websites in Firefox. The attached shows the memory usage of each browser.
creator: mikeschwarz85018
